name: TE Offroad
description:
The most intense offroad experience on mobile.

- No Ads
- No Microtransactions
- Off-road Free Roaming over a massive desert.
- Race for Gold in fast paced Time Trials.
- Explore a massive desert filled with unique areas.
- Beat your high score in Fuel Runs where you race against the clock by collecting valuable fuel.
- Use Air Control to land massive jumps.
- Fast paced gameplay with tight controls.
- High-Def graphics and detailed physics.
- Quality options for smooth gameplay on most devices.
